issue.message: Calling Method.invoke without an SDK check
Calling Method.invoke without an SDK check
Calling Method.invoke without an SDK check
Calling Method.invoke without an SDK check

This call references a method added in API level 30; however, the containing class androidx.mediarouter.media.MediaRoute2Provider.TransferCallback is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
